item.description: Header It’s been a while since I tinkered with my bike. I just bought a roval aero handlebar recently and plan to run the cables internally to make it looks better. I disassembled the bike myself to try it out, but dealing with the Shimano 7020 setup with two hydraulic cables and two shift cables (a total of four lines) was quite a challenge. item.title: Building a website using Hugo & PaperMod

Here introduced how to install Scoop. Hogo’s tutorial introduces how to create a project. item.title: Java Cheat Sheet
item.description: Character 判断是否为字母或数字： boolean res = Character.isLetterOrDigit(char); 转小写： char res = Character.toLowerCase(char); 下一个字符： 'b' == (char) ('a' + 1); Integer 最大值最小值： int max = Integer.MAX_VALUE; int min = Integer.MIN_VALUE; 比较相等： Integer a = 1; Integer b = 1; a == b; // true
